room_title: Escape room "Mystic Mansion" by Escape Zone 60 in Destin
review: I experienced the Mystic Mansion room and it was fun. The staff were very nice and it is also convenient that there is a restaurant downstairs.

room_title: Escape room "Mystic Mansion" by Escape Zone 60 in Destin
review: My family and I drove out to FWB just to experience the Mystic Mansion and while we failed at being the world's best paranormal investigators we had a great time! Marlee was warm and welcoming and the hints she gave were fantastic! The room was well-designed with surprises galore! We can't wait to go back and try the Mummy room!

room_title: Escape room "Mystic Mansion" by Escape Zone 60 in Destin
review: We did the Mystic Mansion escape with our four sons - age 22 to 13. It was challenging but achievable. With two minutes to spare, we made it out. Great activity for a small group. Teens took point and had a ball.

room_title: Escape room "Mystic Mansion" by Escape Zone 60 in Destin
review: Creepy cool! We did Mystic Manor and it did not disappoint! The puzzles were challenging and the room was full of surprises! Will definitely be going back to try the other room.

room_title: Escape room "Mystic Mansion" by Escape Zone 60 in Destin
review: This is a must do. Highly recommend this activity. Our family of 5 did the mystic manor. It was creepy but lots of fun. The puzzles were challenging but had lots of clues. We didn't make it out, but that only made us want to do more of them. Definitely worth it.
